DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether use breast cancer patient ' electronic report side effect chemotherapy treatment set impact handle side effect number hospitalization , febrile neutropenia dose adjustment . We use Patient-Reported Outcomes version Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( PRO-CTCAE ) patient ' report side effect .
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Patient Reporting Side Effects Chemotherapy : A Cluster Randomized Controlled Trial
